game.name: Midnight Tower Defense
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Midnight Tower Defense is a roguelite tower defense strategy game, where you must fight endless waves of enemies either by hand with melee, or by purchasing towers and upgrades to fight from a distance. Every wave the can enemies grow stronger, with every 10 waves being a boss wave.
